title: IGNOU Professor Allegedly Beaten up by Army in Jammu, Probe Ordered
summary: An investigation has been launched after a professor from Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU) was allegedly assaulted by army personnel in Jammu. The incident has prompted authorities to order a probe into the matter.
content: Military authorities have ordered an investigation following allegations that a professor from the Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU) was physically assaulted by army personnel in Jammu. The details of the incident and the identity of the professor have not been fully disclosed, but officials confirm that the matter is being taken seriously and will be thoroughly investigated.
